content: The rising number of fat people was blamed for global warming on Monday. Scientists warned that the increase in big eaters means more food production — a major cause of CO2 gas emissions warming the planet. Overweight people are also more likely to drive, adding to environmental damage. Dr. Phil Edwards, of the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine, said: "Moving about in a heavy body is like driving in a gas guzzler." Each fat person is said to be responsible for emitting a ton more of climate-warming carbon dioxide per year than a thin one. It means an extra billion tons of CO2 a year is created, according to World Health Organization estimates of overweight people. The scientists say providing extra grub for them to guzzle adds to carbon emissions that heat up the world, melting polar ice caps, raising sea levels and killing rain forests. The environmental impact of fat humans is made even worse because they are more likely to travel by car — another major cause of carbon emissions. Read the rest here: "http://www.thesun.co.uk/sol/homepage/news/article2387203.ece" "A government big enough to give you everything you want, is strong enough to take everything you have." ~ Gerald Ford

content: Using this "fruits" argument. The real culprits of Global Warming are the people who work out. Marathon runners/Weight lifters/tri/bi-athletes etc. NFL football players are the main contributors especially if a lineman. If you own a membership to a gym you are a culprit. Drive to workout- workout- drive home. If you are over weight do not try to lose weight. As you are losing by exercising/eating more healthy/organic you are increasing your contribution to MMGW. Then you know you will fail on your weight loss only to try again. Do not try…just sit there and eat Twinkies by the ton but do not do anything that causes an increase in CO2 emitted. The “fruit” that came out with this should be publicly humiliated along with this who agree. Running a 22 mile marathon including all the training leading up to it compared to some person who is 35 lbs over weight. Shoot the runner!
